sqlMap.select: SELECT , 1 AS count FROM gold_standard_publications b WHERE b.simhash1 = #hash# ORDER BY b.date DESC
SELECT , scraperid, 1 AS count FROM gold_standard_publications b, gold_standard_publication_references r WHERE r.publication = #hash# AND b.simhash1 = r.reference
SELECT , scraperid, 1 AS count FROM gold_standard_publications b, gold_standard_publication_references r WHERE r.reference = #hash# AND b.simhash1 = r.reference
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO gold_standard_publication_references (publication, reference, user_name) VALUES (#hash#, #refHash#, #username#)
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM gold_standard_publication_references WHERE publication = #hash# AND reference = #refHash#
